features: Sure Sport Cool Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol 250 ml has been developed to give you cutting-edge protection from sweat and odour
This deodorant spray features our unique MotionSense technology – the more you move, the more it protects
Get all-day freshness and 48h protection from sweat and odour with Sure Sport Cool Anti-perspirant Deodorant Aerosol for Men
Our anti-perspirant has a minty-citrusy fragrance designed to be energising, fresh and sporty
This anti-perspirant aerosol spray is dermatologically tested and alcohol-free*
Sure Sport Cool anti-perspirant deodorant allows you to always be protected for whatever happens. Sure, it won't let you down
description: Product Description Football is all that matters and it is the only thing in your mind and heart. Whether you show your passion for the game through singing, jumping, dancing – if you care about your team, you sweat. Sure Sport Cool for Men is an anti-perspirant deodorant that gives protection to those who live football. This aerosol spray combats sweat and odour for up to 48 hours so you can be confident that Sure is working when you need it most. Its unique minty-citrusy fragrance will keep you protected every minute of the game. It also contains Sure’s innovative MotionSense technology which works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules and they release more fragrance. The more you move, the more it protects. Whether you’re working hard in the office, playing hard out and about or just meeting up with friends, Sure Sport Cool will give you all the back-up you need. Sure, It won't let you down. How to use: Firstly, shake the deodorant can. Then hold it 15 centimetres away from your underarm and spray evenly in a well-ventilated area. Do not use on broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Avoid direct inhalation. Do not spray near eyes. Use only as directed. *ethyl alcohol Directions Firstly, shake the deodorant can. Then hold it 15 centimeters away from your underarm and spray evenly in a well-ventilated area. Do not use on broken skin. Stop use if rash or irritation occurs. Avoid direct inhalation. Do not spray near eyes. Use only as directed.
